entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
